price: Sila sammuu isaaniitu kanatti isaan ajaja moo? Lakkii, isaanumatu ummata jallatoodha.
arabic: أَمۡ تَأۡمُرُهُمۡ أَحۡلَٰمُهُم بِهَٰذَآۚ أَمۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: am tamuruhum aḥlāmuhum bihādhā am hum qawmun ṭāghūna
